mapper.select: SELECT s.id AS storeId, s.store_name, u.user_name, s.contact_phone, s.contact_back_phone, s.store_status, s.del_flag, s.store_weight FROM store s JOIN sys_user u ON s.user_id = u.user_id and s.store_name like concat('%', #{storeName}, '%') and s.del_flag = #{delFlag} and s.store_status = #{storeStatus}

SELECT DISTINCT s.id AS store_id, s.store_name, s.template_num, s.contact_phone, s.contact_back_phone, s.wechat_account, s.qq_account, s.store_address, sc.legal_name, sc.license_name FROM store s JOIN store_certificate sc ON s.id = sc.store_id WHERE s.id = #{storeId}
